heroIntro:
Discover this exceptional 4-bedroom villa in the prestigious enclave of Xabia Nova, Javea—a property that epitomizes Mediterranean sophistication for the discerning buyer. Positioned at €1,575,000, this exclusive residence represents remarkable value within Javea's luxury market, where comparable properties command significantly higher investments. The villa offers uncompromising quality and thoughtful design, catering to those who appreciate understated elegance and premium coastal living on the Costa Blanca.

Javea's reputation as Spain's most refined coastal destination attracts a curated community of international homeowners who prioritize lifestyle quality and investment stability. This property captures that essence—offering direct access to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and a thriving expatriate community renowned for its sophistication and English-speaking professionals.

With four generously proportioned bedrooms and four full bathrooms, this villa provides the space and flexibility demanded by luxury buyers seeking both private family retreats and sophisticated entertaining venues. The sea views deliver that essential connection to Javea's stunning Mediterranean coastline, while the location ensures convenient access to the town's premium amenities and services.
areaSection:
Javea occupies an enviable position on the Costa Blanca, nestled between the dramatic headlands of Cape San Antonio and Cape de la Nao. This geographic setting creates a distinctive microclimate—protected from northern winds while benefiting from consistent Mediterranean sunshine, with annual temperatures averaging 18°C. The town's careful urban planning has preserved its authentic Spanish character whilst accommodating the sophisticated infrastructure demanded by its international community.

The region's natural landscape features dramatic limestone cliffs, hidden coves, and sandy beaches that have remained relatively unspoiled compared to neighboring developments. Javea's elevation and coastal position provide the authentic Mediterranean experience without the overdevelopment associated with other Costa Blanca destinations.
lifestyleSection:
Living in Javea means joining an established community of British, German, Dutch, and Scandinavian professionals who have chosen this location as their permanent or seasonal base. The town's cosmopolitan atmosphere is reflected in its sophisticated dining scene, with excellent international restaurants complementing authentic Spanish establishments. Weekly markets, including the renowned Thursday market in the old town, provide fresh produce and artisanal goods in a convivial setting.

Daily life revolves around beach culture, outdoor activities, and a strong sense of community among long-term residents. English is widely spoken across the town—in hospitals, schools, shops, and professional services—eliminating the integration challenges faced elsewhere on the Costa Blanca. The expat infrastructure is mature and welcoming, with numerous clubs, associations, and activity groups catering to different interests. Healthcare is exceptionally well-provided, with English-speaking medical professionals throughout the town, while international schools offer continuity for families with children.
investmentSection:
This property represents a compelling investment opportunity within the Costa Blanca's premium segment. Javea has demonstrated consistent market appreciation of approximately 6% year-on-year, outperforming broader regional trends and significantly exceeding growth rates in Benidorm and other developed coastal destinations. The rental market reinforces investment value—comparable properties command €1,400 per week during peak season, generating annual returns of 8-10% for owners seeking income supplementation.

At €1,575,000, this villa is priced approximately 30% below equivalent properties in Mallorca, offering sophisticated buyers access to premium Mediterranean lifestyle at considerably better value. The combination of price appreciation, rental income potential, and genuine lifestyle benefits creates a rare convergence of financial and personal returns. Javea's selective development policy and strong English-speaking professional community provide additional confidence in long-term property values.
conclusion:
This exceptional villa in prestigious Xabia Nova represents the convergence of authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, proven investment fundamentals, and sophisticated property positioning that attracts discerning international buyers to Javea. The combination of sea views, strategic location, and €1,575,000 pricing delivers genuine value within the Costa Blanca's premier destination. The established English-speaking professional community, world-class healthcare and education infrastructure, and mature expatriate networks eliminate the integration challenges common elsewhere on the Spanish coast.

For buyers seeking quality over quantity—those who value the refinement of a genuinely cosmopolitan community, the investment stability of Spain's most selective coastal destination, and the authentic Mediterranean experience without overdevelopment—this property merits serious consideration. lifeAndAmenities.intro: Javea offers a rare combination of small-town authenticity and cosmopolitan convenience. Essential services—healthcare, education, shopping, and transportation—are managed to premium standards, with English-speaking professionals throughout the service sector ensuring seamless integration for international residents.

healthcare.text: Healthcare in Javea meets international standards with both private and public facilities staffed by English-speaking medical professionals. The nearby Hospital de Dénia (15 minutes) provides comprehensive acute care and emergency services, while numerous private clinics and specialist practices operate throughout the town. Many doctors have trained internationally and specifically cater to the expatriate community. Routine medical services, prescriptions, and specialist consultations are significantly less expensive than Northern European equivalents, with excellent private insurance available.

shopping.text: Shopping in Javea caters to both Spanish lifestyle preferences and international expectations. Modern supermarkets including Mercadona, Consum, and Masymas stock international products alongside fresh local produce. The British Corner Shop specializes in familiar UK brands and foods. The Thursday market in Javea's old town offers exceptional fresh produce, artisanal goods, and authentic Spanish shopping experiences. Larger shopping centers in nearby Denia and Benidorm provide extended retail selection within 30 minutes.

transport.text: Javea's location provides excellent transportation connectivity despite its small-town character. Alicante Airport (90 minutes) offers connections throughout Europe with budget and scheduled carriers. Bus services connect Javea to Denia, Alicante, and surrounding Costa Blanca destinations. The Denia ferry port (15 minutes) operates summer services to Ibiza and Mallorca. Most residents find that a personal vehicle provides optimal flexibility, though the town remains comfortably navigable on foot or by local bus.
